# Flo's Letter Format Template

This is a Quarto template that assists you in creating a letters. It is based on `quarto-monash/letter`

## Creating a new letter

You can use this as a template to create a letter.
To do this, use the following command:

```bash
quarto use template floswald/quarto-letter
```

This will install the extension and create an example qmd file that you can use as a starting place for your letter.

## Installation for existing document

You may also use this format with an existing Quarto project or document.
From the quarto project or document directory, run the following command to install this format:

```bash
quarto install extension floswald/quarto-letter
```
